<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/fp-connector/api/v1/upload-fund-transfer-schedule"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is used to upload a fund transfer schedule to the system.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"fundTranserDetails":{"description":"An array of fund transfer details, where each object contains","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"description":"The amount to be transferred","type":"string","example":"2000"},"beneficiaryName":{"description":"The name of the beneficiary","type":"string","example":"ALIYU MUSTAPHA"},"creditAccountNo":{"description":"The account number to which the amount will be credited","type":"string","example":"3309485732"},"creditBankCode":{"description":"The bank code of the credit account","type":"string","example":"54"},"debitAccountNo":{"description":"The account number from which the amount will be debited","type":"string","example":"20382932823"},"debitBankCode":{"description":"The bank code of the debit account","type":"string","example":"32"},"naration":{"description":"A narration for the transaction","type":"string","example":"Yeah"},"orgtranParticular":{"description":"Particulars of the organization transaction","type":"string","example":"23e56t43"},"orgtranrefno":{"description":"The reference number of the organization transaction","type":"string","example":"12"},"paymentDate":{"description":"The date of the payment in YYYY-MM-DD format","type":"string","format":"date","example":"2024-01-23"},"serialNum":{"description":"The serial number of the transaction","type":"string","example":"1"}}},"example":[{"amount":"2000","beneficiaryName":"ALIYU MUSTAPHA","creditAccountNo":"3309485732","creditBankCode":"54","debitAccountNo":"20382932823","debitBankCode":"32","naration":"Yeah","orgtranParticular":"12","orgtranrefno":"23e56t43","paymentDate":"2024-01-23","serialNum":"1"}]},"scheduleCode":{"description":"A unique code for the schedule","type":"string","example":"scc-010"}}},"examples":{"Upload Fund Transfer Schedule":{"value":{"fundTranserDetails":[{"amount":"2000","beneficiaryName":"ALIYU MUSTAPHA","creditAccountNo":"3309485732","creditBankCode":"54","debitAccountNo":"20382932823","debitBankCode":"32","naration":"Yeah","orgtranParticular":"12","orgtranrefno":"23e56t43","paymentDate":"2024-01-23","serialNum":"1"}],"scheduleCode":"scc-010"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Response","headers":{"Content-Encoding":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"gzip"}},"Date":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Wed, 28 Feb 2024 10:13:22 GMT"}},"Server":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Microsoft-IIS/10.0"}},"Transfer-Encoding":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"chunked"}},"Vary":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Accept-Encoding"}},"X-Powered-By":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"ASP.NET"}}},"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"nullable":true,"example":null},"message":{"type":"string","example":"Fund Transfer(s) uploaded successfully"},"success":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}},"examples":{"Response":{"value":{"data":null,"message":"Fund Transfer(s) uploaded successfully","success":true}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
